assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: VLS Finance Limited provides various financial services in India. The company's corporate consulting and advisory services include private placement of equities, debentures, and preference shares and bonds with banks, financial institutions, foreign institutional investors, mutual funds, corporates, and high net worth clients; advising on the structuring of schemes for raising debts in the form of fixed income securities; project reports, evaluations, and appraisals from financial institutions/banks; syndication of term loans, working capital, bridge loans, and short term financing; and advisory services on financial and corporate restructuring, spin-offs, mergers and acquisitions, and takeovers. Its corporate consulting and advisory services also comprise arranging external commercial borrowings and advising on rupee term loan swaps with foreign currency loans; support services, including corporate finance, tax planning, audit and accounting, financial and legal consultancy for corporates; arranging factoring of book debts and credit rating; placement of commercial papers; creation of trusts and procedural aspects of securities creation; syndication of asset funding businesses; and identification and arrangement of tie-ups of domestic and foreign partnerships. In addition, the company offers investment banking services, such as determination of the issue size and pricing; drafting of the offer document and filling it with SEBI for approval; co-ordination with various regulatory authorities and private agencies during the issue; monitoring of the press, investor, and analyst meets; selection of the market timing; and other services. VLS Finance Limited was incorporated in 1986 and is based in New Delhi, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Kishan Kumar Soni FCA, FCS
companyOfficers.title: Director of Fin., CFO & Director
